header.title: Static content - including raw un-processed files and documents

section.title: Linking to static content
section.p: You can include raw HTML, PDFs, plain-text, and other files. They are included in the Forrest-built site, by placing them in the src/documentation/content/ directory and they will be copied over automatically. You can link to them as normal, e.g. <link href="test3.html">test3.html</link> and <link href="../hello.pdf">hello.pdf</link>
You can also have sub-directories such as src/documentation/content/samples/subdir/ which reflects your main xdocs/ tree. The raw files will then end up beside your documents.
More information in the Linking demonstration.
